title: (x) China 2004 - Made In China {Jan Sandvik}
content: anyone can help? what font is this? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125084332im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41290.jpg)
author: astarz

comments.content:
It's close, but they must have used a different A for the banner sample. Maybe Made in China is an 'adaptation' of a different font?   
   
In any case, that would sure be a good starting point, if no one knows a better match.
